scripts.example:chat:bundle: npm run example:chat:server:build && npm run example:chat:client:bundle && mkdir -p examples/chat/server/lib/public/chat && cp -R examples/chat/client/static/* examples/chat/server/lib/public/chat/
scripts.example:chat:client:bundle: npm run example:chat:client:esbuild -- --minify && npm run example:chat:client:build && npm run example:chat:client:css
scripts.example:chat:client:css: cd examples/chat/client && tailwindcss --config tailwind.config.cjs --input src/css/styles.css --output static/index.generated.css
scripts.example:chat:client:serve: npm run example:chat:client:css && npm run example:chat:client:esbuild -- --servedir=static && npm run example:chat:client:build && npm run example:chat:client:css
scripts.server:stop: kill $(ps -e | grep 'ts-node test/ts/test-server.ts' | grep -v grep | xargs | cut -d ' ' -f 1)
